Blogging

Up to a point you welcome being interrupted because it is only by interacting with other people that you get anything interesting done.

~ Ken Robinson

You might have noticed, or you might have not…

I’ve been changing things up on my website and I’ve decided to move my blogging out and into my new platform. I’ll leave this blog untouched (so we don’t lose all the blob posts I’ve written over time).

From now on I’ll be posting here: https://ecomba.pro/publications/blog.

And as always, have a wonderful day!
